response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, tailored to your specific needs or interests. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, we kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $15,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with this extraordinary product.", "product_price": 15000}
